introduction: Boc Ophthalmic Instruments Pty Limited is primarily engaged in the wholesale distribution of professional equipment and goods used, prescribed, or sold by ophthalmologists, optometrists, and opticians.
title: BOC Ophthalmic Instruments Profile
description: Esthablished in 1920 BOC Instruments is an Australian owned & family run company with a proud tradition & reputation for delivering quality products & service ...

The Macular Pigment Screener (MPS ll) from Elektron Technology is a portable screening device enabling early detection of patients at risk of Age-Related Macular Degeneration (AMD) – the leading cause of vision loss in people over 50
© Copyright 2020 BOC Instruments. All rights reserved. Powered by
Distributors of an extensive range of
The Henson 9000 is the ideal perimeter for the early detection of glaucoma and the ongoing management of established loss.
Suitable for all eye care settings, the 9000 combines sensitive, specific and fast suprathreshold glaucoma screening with its unique ZATA threshold algorithm.

Standard, single stimulus suprathreshold screening tests are available, along with faster, patient-preferred, multiple stimulus versions, completely unique to the Henson range. Henson screening programs also give operators the flexibility to customise screening by re-testing missed stimuli and/or extending patterns in-test to rule out false positives with a new level of confidence.
The Henson 9000 also boasts the ZATA threshold algorithm, uniquely able to use prior patient data for the highly accurate measurement of defect progression.

The Henson 7000 is a uniquely robust and portable central visual field screener.
Designed to suit the constraints of the small consulting room or the mobile nature of domiciliary practice, the portable, durable Henson 7000 brings complete flexibility to glaucoma screening.

Standard, single stimulus suprathreshold screening tests are available, along with faster, patient-preferred, multiple stimulus versions, completely unique to the Henson range. Henson screening programs also give operators the flexibility to customise screening by re-testing missed stimuli and/or extending patterns in-test to rule out false positives with a new level of confidence.
Quick and easy-to-use, the Henson 7000 enables eye care professionals to detect glaucoma with a high degree of specificity.

NIDEK is proud to announce that our LE-700 Edging Station won the first "Vision-X VP Award" at the Vision-X Dubai 2014 Optical Trade Show held in Dubai, UAE from November 25th to 27th.

Vision-X is the only optical and eyecare industry event in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region, bringing buyers and sellers together each year to source new products and suppliers, and catch up with the latest trends, customers, contacts, and industry information.

Initiated with VisionPlus Arabia, the leading trade magazine in 2014, “Vision-X VP Awards” are the first ever industry awards in the region recognizing the best products in the business, as voted for by the industry.

Motoki Ozawa, President and CEO, said, "It is a great honor to win such a prestigious award. Following the MTP GOLD Medal prize in Poland* , this news entitles us to prove that the LE-700 is highly evaluated by our customers. We continue to develop products which satisfy customers' needs and expectations."
*The LE-700 has been awarded the "MTP GOLD Medal" prize at the "OPTYKA 2014" Optical Trade Show held in Poznan, Poland from November 7th to 8th.

The LE-700 is a highly-compact, "all-in-one" solution, featuring an integrated intelligent blocker and "tracer-free" tracing technology which traces demo lenses and patterns. The color touch screen with intuitive icons makes the unit extremely user-friendly and guides the operator through the entire tracing, blocking, and edging process.

Two “add-on” options for the LE-700 expand its capability even further. The first is a newly designed, on-board frame tracer. The second optional “add-on” available for the LE-700 is a grooving / safety beveling wheel which integrates these two features into one unit, providing highly accurate processing.

With the LE-700, you can create the system that works best for you and your practice's needs. The LE-700 is not just an edger - it's a complete Edging Station, combining NIDEK's advanced technology into a compact-sized unit.

NIDEK is proud to announce that our LE-700 Edging Station has been awarded the "MTP GOLD Medal" prize at the "OPTYKA 2014" Optical Trade Show held in Poznan, Poland from November 7th to 8th. The LE-700 has received the international award for the first time.

OPTYKA is an exhibition that is held in Poland every other year. "MTP GOLD Medal" is granted to the highest quality eyeglass frames, lenses, and optic instruments.This year,six products,including the LE-700,were awarded the MTP GOLD Medal. NIDEK has won this award three times, the Lex 1000 at the first OPTYKA in 2008 and the Me 1200 in 2010.
"The news of this award pleased us and I am proud to have the

LE-700 receive its first international award. This award is a result of merging NIDEK's latest technology, which enables the operator to create a variety of top-quality eyewear with incredible ease." said Motoki Ozawa, President of NIDEK CO., LTD.

The LE-700 is a highly-compact, "all-in-one" solution, featuring an integrated intelligent blocker and "tracer-free" tracing technology which traces demo lenses and patterns. The color touch screen with intuitive icons, make the unit extremely user-friendly and guides the operator through the tracing, blocking, and edging process.

With the LE-700, you can create the system that works best for you and your practice's needs. The LE-700 is not just an edger - it's a complete Edging Station, combining NIDEK's advanced technology in a compact-sized unit.

NIDEK CO., LTD. is proud to announce that our TS-310 Tabletop Refraction System was awarded the prize of "Silmo d'Or" at SILMO Paris 2017, held in Paris, France, from October 6 to 9.
This is the fifth time for NIDEK to receive the Silmo d'Or. It was preceded by the OPD-Scan ll winning the prize in 2008, the ARK-560A in 2009, the Me 1200 in 2010, and the ARK-1s in 2013.

SILMO Paris is one of the largest international optics and eyewear trade-shows with about 30,000 visitors attending from all over the world every year. In this trade-show, international manufacturers of spectacle frames and equipment announce and exhibit their products including attractive new models.
The prize of Silmo d'Or is given to the best product among eyeglass frames, optical lenses, lens edgers, and eye examination instruments.
We consider this award as validation that our products are highly valued by our customers in Europe. We will continue to strive to develop products that provide solutions for our global customers.

Enhanced Functionality with the SE-9090 Express
The NIDEK Robotic Handling Unit (RHU) Series offer automatic lens conveyance to assist automation of the SE-9090 Express' lens processing in industrial labs.
The RHU-1000S (with stacker), RHU-1000CB (with conveyer belt) and RHU-1500 can provide continuous automatic processing to achieve high productivity and profits for large production labs.
The RHU-1000 (without stacker/conveyer belt) is also an available option.
